subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A fan of the Greek team PAOK was arrested after a crate of anchovies was dumped on the visitors’ bench, delaying a Greek Cup semifinal in Thessaloniki for more than an hour.
snippet: A fan of the Greek team PAOK was arrested after a crate of anchovies was dumped on the visitors’ bench, delaying a Greek Cup semifinal in Thessaloniki for more than an hour.
